description: Retrieves information about an archive rule. To learn about filter keys that you can use to create an archive rule, see IAM Access Analyzer filter keys in the IAM User Guide.

parameters.name: analyzerName
parameters.description: The name of the analyzer to retrieve rules from.

parameters.name: ruleName
parameters.description: The name of the rule to retrieve.

nested_items.name: archiveRule
nested_items.description: Contains information about an archive rule. Archive rules automatically archive new findings that meet the criteria you define when you create the rule.

nested_items.name: ruleName
nested_items.description: The name of the archive rule.

nested_items.name: eq
nested_items.description: An --equals-- operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_items.name: neq
nested_items.description: A --not equals-- operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_items.name: contains
nested_items.description: A --contains-- operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_items.name: exists
nested_items.description: An --exists-- operator to match for the filter used to create the rule.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the archive rule was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the archive rule was last updated.
